  2. The Xianzhou Luofu Characters

The Xianzhou Luofu Characters

Sampo

A merchant who freely travels between the Overworld and the Underworld. He acts like he is everyone's friend, is enthusiastically humorous, and is good at bantering.

Read more about Sampo

Jing Liu

Former Sword Champion of the Luofu, and the creator of the Cloud Knights' legends of undefeated might. Now, her name has been wiped from the records, and she is a traitor of the Xianzhou walking on the fine line between sanity and mara-struck.

Read more about Jing Liu
